articles.description: Earlier during the Legends League in Qatar, Shahid Afridi sparked controversy when he gave autographs on Indian Tricolour while keeping the flag on his thigh. | OpIndia News
articles.content: Former Pakistan cricket captain Shahid Afridi has pleaded with Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi to send the Indian cricket team to Pakistan for the Asia Cup this year. The now finally retired Paki… [+3318 chars]

articles.author: Deivarayan Muthu
articles.title: Ellis in Wonderland - 'I have to pinch myself sometimes when I wear the Australia colours' - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: "Being able to rub shoulders with him and bounce ideas and debrief games, it's something I've cherished," Ellis says about bowling with Mitchell Starc
articles.content: News"Being able to rub shoulders with him and bounce ideas and debrief games, it's something I've cherished," Ellis says about bowling with Mitchell Starc
